entry.title: Little Carron Mountain (440m) offers stunning views of the Ballyhoura Country. Maybe you‚Äôll be mesmerised by the windmills, or be captivated by drifting clouds, or even catch a beautiful sunset. The summit is just a short detour from the Castlepook mounta
entry.content: Little Carron Mountain (440m) offers stunning views of the Ballyhoura Country. Maybe you‚Äôll be mesmerised by the windmills, or be captivated by drifting clouds, or even catch a beautiful sunset. The summit is just a short detour from the Castlepook mountain biking route (54km) and is also part of the Ballyhoura Way. For day-hikers, a great option is to start from the Ballinaboola car-park and hike to the summit. Make sure to add this peak to your list the next time you‚Äôre out in the Ballyhouras! #Ballyhoura #VisitBallyhoura #BallyhouraMoments #BallyhouraMountains #MunsterVales #IrelandsHiddenHeartlands #LimerickEdgeEmbrace #DiscoverIreland #KeepDiscovering #GetOutdoors #AdventureTourism #Irelandtravel #ballyhouraforest #coillteoutdoors @Munster Vales @Ireland‚Äôs Hidden Heartlands @Discover Ireland @Limerick.ie @Tourism Ireland

entry.title: Everything you need for a great ride...in one place! Did you know the Ballyhoura Trail Centre has... 1. Secure car parking. Cashless payments are easy, or purchase an annual pass on coillte.ie 2. Bike rentals. Make sure to book in with the Trailriders cre
entry.content: Everything you need for a great ride...in one place! Did you know the Ballyhoura Trail Centre has... 1. Secure car parking. Cashless payments are easy, or purchase an annual pass on coillte.ie 2. Bike rentals. Make sure to book in with the Trailriders crew @ballyhouratrailriders 3. A bike shop with all the essentials, like bike gear, spare tubes, snacks and coffee 4. Toilets 5. A bike wash (‚Ç¨2 required) 6. Showers (2 x ‚Ç¨1 coins required) 7. Picnic tables for post-ride munchies And a fantastic community atmosphere, especially on weekends. With over 98km of mountain biking trails, including recent exciting new additions to the network, don't miss the chance to ride here. @Munster Vales @Ireland‚Äôs Hidden Heartlands @Discover Ireland @Limerick.ie @Tourism Ireland #ORIS #OurRuralFuture #Ireland2040 #Ballyhoura #VisitBallyhoura #BallyhouraMoments #BallyhouraMountains #MunsterVales #IrelandsHiddenHeartlands #LimerickEdgeEmbrace #DiscoverIreland #KeepDiscovering #GetOutdoors #AdventureTourism #Irelandtravel #ballyhouraforest #coillteoutdoors #mountainbiking #mtb #mtblife #mtblovers

entry.title: Handy tips for longer days in the saddle! If you're new to Ballyhoura's mountain biking trails, here are a few handy tips on what to bring for the bigger loops (Tech Route 24km, Garrane Route 35km, Castlepook Route 54km). Is there something we've missed?
entry.content: Handy tips for longer days in the saddle! If you're new to Ballyhoura's mountain biking trails, here are a few handy tips on what to bring for the bigger loops (Tech Route 24km, Garrane Route 35km, Castlepook Route 54km).
